title: Effective Learning Strategy Design in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language learning experience and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Corporate training program aimed at improving language proficiency, providing personalized feedback through project-based assessments and individual learning data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can develop learning plans using time-management tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners can construct language-learning strategies by integrating online/offline learning materials.
Learners can monitor and adjust their learning progress using self-directed learning tools.
Learners can compare and evaluate surface-level/deep-level learning strategies through data-driven analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
